title: Emerson on the nation - logical extension

content.prompt: Which of the following developments best represents a logical extension of the ideas expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The rise of big business in the Gilded Age
The expansion of participatory democracy in the Progressive Era
The rise of Social Darwinism in the late nineteenth century
The increasing support for the annexation of overseas territories

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
